# Definitions

__Amazon Machine Image (AMI):__ A virtual machine template for all instances launched within Metworx

__Chef:__ Software for scripted, reproducible hardware abstraction (https://www.chef.io/) 

__Cookbook:__ The unit of code (Ruby) within Chef that dictates configuration of specific software or functionality 

\textbf{Git:} Version control software used by MetrumRG with relation to infrastructure source code control 

__Metworx:__ Metrum Research Group's pharmacometric modeling platform for use with Amazon Web Services (AWS)

__metrumrg R package:__  A collection of R functions which assist in pharmacometric modeling and other Metrum Research Group essential activities (https://r-forge.r-project.org/projects/metrumrg/)

__Envision Index:__ Web application for Envision developers and users to access and configure Envision Apps.

# Purpose

To validate newly created Envision Index, which will be the new landing page when users go to Envision.
